price: 56. En vervolgens deden wij jullie na jullie dood opstaan, opdat jullie dankbaar zouden zijn.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
